## Libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```


## Read in the data
```{r}
season1 <- read_tsv("season1.tsv")
```

## Create new dataframe
```{r}
season1_cat <- season1 %>%
  group_by(category) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n))
```
